# Tutorials Docs

## Tutorials

- [Functional programming concepts](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/tutorials/functional-programming-concepts.md): Learn the concepts of functional programming in F#.
- [Asynchronous programming](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/tutorials/async.md): Learn how F# provides clean support for asynchrony based on a language-level programming model derived from core functional programming concepts.
- [Using functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/tutorials/using-functions.md): Learn about functions and how they are important for programming in F#.

## Children

- [Type Providers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/tutorials/type-providers/llms.txt)
